name: Mana Draught
description: A refreshing drink best shared with friends.

abilities.name: Bottoms Up
abilities.description: Restores the user's mana over the duration by increasing their mana regeneration, based on a fixed amount plus a portion of their maximum mana.
notes: Interrupts the wielder's channeling abilities upon cast
The ability always self-casts upon cast
Ctrl enables casting Regenerate on an allied hero
Considers clones, illusions, and creep-heroes as heroes
Reapplying the buff refreshes the duration
The regeneration checks the target's max mana periodically and updates the regeneration value instantly
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) dispels the buff
Taking more than 0 damage from Roshan (after reductions) dispels the buff
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the max mana restore is increased by 30%

abilities.name: Fill Up
abilities.description: The cooldown speed of Bottoms Up is increased while standing in waters.
notes: The cooldown updates immediately upon leaving or entering any body of water
The reduction is always based on the current remaining cooldown
When entering waters while e.g. 10 seconds are left on the cooldown, it drops down to 7 seconds

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
